name: test_launch_with_proxy
description:
使用代理 IP 运行浏览器
    前提是安装了 3party/ 下的 proxy_pool
descriptionHtml:
使用代理 IP 运行浏览器
前提是安装了 3party/ 下的 proxy_pool

statusTrace:
@pytest.mark.asyncio
    async def test_launch_with_proxy():
        """
        使用代理 IP 运行浏览器
        前提是安装了 3party/ 下的 proxy_pool
        """
        ProxyPoolHelper().get_region_proxy('湖南')
        proxy = {'server': '39.129.73.6:443'}
        async with async_playwright() as playwright:
            async with PlaywrightCommon(proxy=proxy).launch_browser_mgr(playwright) as (_, _, page):
>               resp = await page.request.get('https://ip.useragentinfo.com/json')
